message.entry: Non paired input arguments. Parameters 'vendorID','productID', or 'productName' and its value must come in pairs.
Supported .NET Framework not found. Install .NET framework 4.0 and above.
Parameter {0} not supported. Supported parameter-value pairs are 'vendorID','productID', or 'productName'
Not enough input arguments. Pass at least one of the parameters, 'vendorID','productID', or 'productName' and its corresponding value.
Mounting Failed: Install "udisks" or manually mount your hardware.
Parameter not supported, require a numeric input argument for vendorID/productID.
. Supported types of the parameter value are "Character vector" and "String Scalar".
Input arguments not supported. Instead use methods getSerialPorts and getMountPoints with input arguments.
